Wallow - Lightweight Social Media Browser
==========================================

Prerequisites:
-------------
1. Microsoft WebView2 Runtime (Evergreen)
   - Included by default in Windows 11 and updated Windows 10.
   - Download: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/webview2/#download-section

2. Visual C++ Redistributable (x64)
   - Most users likely have this installed.
   - Download: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170

Installation:
-------------
- No installation required. Just unzip the folder and run Wallow.exe.
- You can create a shortcut to Wallow.exe on your Desktop or Start Menu.

Settings:
---------
- Settings are stored in %LOCALAPPDATA%\Wallow\settings.ini.

Troubleshooting:
----------------
- If the app doesn't start, please ensure you have the WebView2 Runtime installed.
